title: siena
description: Structural Image Evaluation, using Normalization, of Atrophy tool for evaluating brain atrophy between two timepoints

input1.title: First input image
input1.description: First input image (e.g. timepoint 1 image, img1.nii.gz)

input2.title: Second input image
input2.description: Second input image (e.g. timepoint 2 image, img2.nii.gz)

bet_options.title: BET options
bet_options.description: Options to pass to BET brain extraction (inside double-quotes), e.g. -B "-f 0.3"

two_class_seg_flag.title: Two-class segmentation flag
two_class_seg_flag.description: Two-class segmentation (don't segment grey and white matter separately)

standard_space_mask_flag.title: Standard-space masking flag
standard_space_mask_flag.description: Use standard-space masking as well as BET

upper_ignore.title: Upper ignore threshold
upper_ignore.description: Ignore from t (mm) upwards in MNI152/Talairach space

lower_ignore.title: Lower ignore threshold
lower_ignore.description: Ignore from b (mm) downwards in MNI152/Talairach space (b should probably be negative)

sienadiff_options.title: Siena_diff options
sienadiff_options.description: Options to pass to siena_diff timepoint differencing (inside double-quotes), e.g. -S "-s -i 20"
